location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: 'MAP 26 SKETCH MAP OF AREA NORTH OF BAGHDAD.'

physicalDescription.extent: Materials: Printed on paperDimensions: 246 x 366mm, on sheet 308 x 425mm

mods.abstract: The map accompanies The Campaign in Mesopotamia 1914-1918. Volume III, and shows a region of western Persia and eastern Iraq to the north of Baghdad, indicating towns, settlements, roads, railways and watercourses. Hachures and sketch marks give some indication of relief, and rivers, lakes and marshes are printed in blue.Prepared in the Historical Section of the Committee of Imperial Defence, and printed at the Ordnance Survey in 1925.
